6.MetaDescription: Chef Prepared Gourmet Appetizers, Entrees and Desserts. The Perfect Gourmet brings you award-winning, prepared foods that go from freezer to table in just minutes. Each of our appetizers, entrées and desserts is carefully crafted with only the finest and freshest ingredients, then flash frozen at preparation to capture even the most delicate, exotic flavors.
